import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import { observer } from "mobx-react"; import "../Styles/SurveyForm.css"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import surveyStore from "../Mobx/SurveyStore"; interface PersonProps { QuestionID: number; Answer: string; } interface RemarksProps { Remarks: string; MobileNo: string; TransactionID: number; } const SurveyForm: React.FC = () => { const [Q1, setQ1] = useState({ QuestionID: 0, Answer: "", }); const [Remarks, setRemarks] = useState({ Remarks: "", MobileNo: "", TransactionID: 0, }); const [show, Setshow] = useState(false); const handleRemarks = (e: { target: { name: any; value: any } }) => { setRemarks({ ...Remarks, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const ShowRemarks = () => { if (Q1.Answer === "Poor") { Setshow(true); } else { Setshow(false); } }; const handleQ1 = (e: { target: { name: any; value: any } }) => { setQ1({ ...Q1, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; useEffect(() => { async function fetchData() { await surveyStore.GetQuestion(); } fetchData(); }, []); if (surveyStore.isLoading) { return <>; } Q1.QuestionID = surveyStore.Questions[0].PKID; const handleSubmit = async (e: any) => { e.preventDefault(); // await surveyStore.SubmitQ1(Q1); console.log(Q1); }; return (

Customer Satisfaction Survey

{surveyStore.Questions[1].Question_En}

{surveyStore.Questions[3].Question_En}

) : ( <> )}
); }; export default observer(SurveyForm);
